LanguageData.HediffHideModeSetting_Description: Choose when standard subparts should be hidden in the Health Overview tab. - Always: standard sub-parts will be always hidden - Never: standard sub-parts will be always visible - Clean: standard sub-parts will be hidden when there are no other hediffs on their part
LanguageData.RemoveAllFromSegmentSetting_Title: Remove all sub-parts from segment version
LanguageData.RemoveAllFromSegmentSetting_Description: Enabling this will remove and spawn all sub-parts after switching a prosthetic to Segment version.
